job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Required Skills:</strong></p><ul><li>Expert in MySQL and one or more of the following: Oracle, Mongodb, Postgres, Oracle, MSSQL, Kafka, Hadoop, Hbase or Hive&nbsp;</li><li>Experience in Kafka for at least 1 year is Must. </li><li>Bachelor's degree in computer science or Information Technology</li><li>Expert in database and SQL tuning&nbsp;</li><li>Expert trouble-shooter&nbsp;</li><li>Authored software to do parts or all of your job</li><li>Strong Shell, Python and SQL scripting to automate DB related jobs&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Familiarity with observability tools such as Grafana, Prometheus, Vividcortex, Solarwinds, Nagios, Icinga, Munin, Cacti, Wireshark</li><li>Ability to work with development teams&nbsp;</li><li>Familiarity with low level debugging tools: strace, tcpdump, gdb, lsof and netstat&nbsp;</li><li>Familiarity with Splunk&nbsp;</li><li>Expertise in setting up and testing backups&nbsp;</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Respond to issues within the Service Level Objective during your assigned on-call rotation</li><li>Support 1 of 2 of these tracks of technology</li><li>Kafka, ElasticSearch+LogStash+Kibana and RabbitMQ</li><li>MySQL, Postgres, Oracle, MSSQL</li><li>Write software to improve the reliability, scalability and performance of Client’s infrastructure</li><li>Troubleshoot broken systems and services issues</li></ul>
